page.title: 07My farm
page.content: I live at White Lodge Farm.We have 120 acres.We also run a haulage business with two lorries.My dad only does trge combining and the ploughing.My mum does the baling the fertilising and the milking.We grow our own barley and wheat.We sell the wheat and keep the barley for food for the cows and beef stock.Six cows can be milked at once. The milk goes into 180 gallon tank. We mix the bulls and the heifers because we sell them before they are a year old.We have two boys and my uncle John working for us.
